summary: Drumhouse is my first mod i have put up here on nexus. It's a simple playerhome located close to whiterun in the ruined house. A lore friendly little place that's available to all players, almost as soon as you start the game.
descriptionHtml:
[b]Drumhouse is my first mod i have put up here on nexus. It's a simple playerhome located close to whiterun in the ruined house. A lore friendly little place that's available to all players, almost as soon as you start the game.

This is just a simple player home, nothing fancy.

Location:
The drumhouse is located inside the ruins of a building close to whiterun, you can find a key to the trapdoor in the chest next to the trapdoor.

Features:
- Bedroll,  so you can rest after long day of adventuring.
- Cooking pot, for you cooking needs.
- Fireplace (That you can light yourself, yay!)
- Axe
- Some food, if you can't cook yourself ;)

Installation:
Use NMM/MO or extract the file to your: Skyrim/Data - folder

[b]At the moment this is only an alpha version, everything should work at least as much as I have tested. But I'm gonna add some more features in the future.[/b][/b]
author: p2ir
